meanings.definition: The act of coming together or assembling.
meanings.sent1: The family enjoyed a gathering at the park for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The town hall was filled with people for the community gathering.
meanings.sent3: The gathering of friends for a surprise party was a success.
meanings.sent4: The gathering storm clouds warned of an impending thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The gathering of colorful leaves in the yard signaled the arrival of autumn.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things gathered together.
meanings.sent1: The gathering of students in the library was for a study session.
meanings.sent2: The gathering of birds on the tree branch was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent3: The gathering of toys on the floor made the room look messy.
meanings.sent4: The gathering of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The gathering of seashells on the beach was a treasure hunt for the children.

meanings.definition: The act of collecting or harvesting.
meanings.sent1: The gathering of apples in the orchard was a yearly tradition.
meanings.sent2: The gathering of information for the report took hours of research.
meanings.sent3: The gathering of coins in the piggy bank was for a special purchase.
meanings.sent4: The gathering of crops in the fields marked the end of the harvest season.
meanings.sent5: The gathering of seashells along the shore was a hobby for many beachcombers.
